intro.title: VortexStream
intro.description: High-performance short-form video SDK cho React - Xây dựng trải nghiệm video như TikTok/Reels

packages/core.description: Core logic, types, stores, và utilities cho VortexStream.

packages/gestures.title: @vortex/gestures
packages/gestures.description: Gesture system cho VortexStream - Tap, swipe, long press, và more.

packages/player.description: HLS video player tối ưu cho short-form content.
